text: 27.39-40: Sng 22.7 naŋga, 109.25 naŋga, Mt 26.61 naŋga, Jo 2.19Kamatɨhu, krunavundi uhuvañɨndɨndɨ ambasuvanzuva, miku tɨwahandɨwaha nɨmavamu. Na Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhu tavɨ haŋandɨhin yɨvukuvɨmbɨrata, arɨkikwɨrɨ hɨvɨyɨ taya tararamarama mɨŋga. Harɨm nambi ŋgurama. Kandɨsɨkwɨsɨkwɨ na Gotɨndu Ñɨŋitiŋgata ahuandɨ ha mitata mɨŋga, vamu.
